message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for this unique item.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $9000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above $10000. Can you consider $9500?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still think the product is worth more than $9500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good price for it. How about we meet at $10500?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think $10000 is a fair price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be careful with my budget. Can you consider $10250?

I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $10750, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I need to make sure I get a good price for this product.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $10750. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be careful with my finances. Can you consider $10375?

I've made a few concessions already, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $11000. I think this product is worth it, and I'm willing to meet you at this price. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
